Question: Kubera iki mumaze igihe kinini mutaduha uburenganzira bwo gufungura Irembo ryacu? Ndashaka nanjye kujya mfasha abantu kubona serivisi z'Irembo
Answer: Tubitangire imbabazi kubera gutinda gutanga uburenganzira. Turimo gukorana umwete kugira ngo twihutishe inzira. Mushobora kureba ku rubuga rwacu cyangwa mugahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha kugira ngo mumenye amakuru agezweho.

Question: Ese umuntu ashaka akazi mu Irembo yabavugisha gute?
Answer: Ushobora kureba ku rubuga rwacu rwa Irembo ahandikirwa imyanya y'akazi ishyirwaho, cyangwa ukohereza umwirondoro wawe kuri aderesi yacu y'amakuru rusange.

Question: Icyangombwa cyanjye cy'ubutaka narakibuze kandi ngejeje igihe cyo gutanga umusoro, ubwo nakibona gute ngo mbashe kwishyura imisoro
Answer: Kugira ngo ubone icyangombwa cy'ubutaka bundi bushya, wagana ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubutaka cyangwa ukoreshe urubuga rwa Irembo (irembo.gov.rw) usaba kopi yacyo. Uzakenera gutanga ibisobanuro by'ubutaka bwawe.

Question: Ese ko mbona gusaba pasiporo bitari gukunda mwamfasha kuyinsabira
Answer: Birashoboka ko hari ikibazo cya tekiniki. Gerageza kongera cyangwa uhamagare umurongo wacu w'ubufasha kuri [Nimero ya telefone y'Irembo] kugira ngo bagufashe mu gusaba pasiporo.

Question: Ese Irembo, iyo umuntu amaze kwiyandikisha kuri permit ntabone code yiwe biba byagenze gute ubwo?
Answer: Hari igihe code ishobora gutinda kubera impamvu za tekiniki cyangwa verifikasiyo. Ushobora kureba kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukavugisha serivisi z'abakiriya kugira ngo bakurikirane ikibazo cyawe.

Question: Aka message mwampaye narakabuze kandi ejo mfite examen. nakabona gute?
Answer: Ushobora gusaba ko bakongera kukohereza ubutumwa ukoresheje konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wabo. Tegura nimero yawe y'irangamuntu cyangwa dosiye.

Question: Icyumweru gishize niyandikishije ku kizami ariko sinibuka italiki y'ikizamini. Munyibutse italiki
Answer: Ushobora kureba itariki y'ikizamini cyawe winjiye kuri konti yawe ya Irembo ahanditse 'Ibyo nasabye', cyangwa ugahamagara umurongo wabo w'ubufasha kuri [Nimero ya telefone y'Irembo].

Question: Nijoro niyandikishije ariko ndi kwishyura bikanga. Kandi ndabishaka cyane mumfashe
Answer: Bishobora guterwa n'ikibazo cy'igihe gito muri sisitemu yo kwishyura. Gerageza kongera nyuma gato cyangwa ukoreshe ubundi buryo bwo kwishyura bushoboka. Niba bikomeje, hamagara ubufasha bw'abakiriya.

Question: Nasabye icyemezo gisimbura indangamuntu ariko ntabwo nibuka numero yanjye ya dosiye. Mwanyibutsa?
Answer: Ushobora gusanga numero ya dosiye yawe muri SMS cyangwa email wakiriye nyuma yo gusaba. Niba utayibona, hamagara serivisi z'abakiriya za Irembo ufite amakuru yawe bwite, baragufasha.

Question: Ndikugerageza kudownloadinga icyemezo cyanjye cy'amavuko nk'ibisanzwe ariko ntibikunda sinzi ikibazo kirimo
Answer: Gerageza gukoresha indi internet browser cyangwa uhanagure cache ya browser yawe. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, bishobora kuba ari ikibazo cya seriveri. Ongera ugerageze nyuma gato cyangwa uvugishe ubufasha bwa Irembo.

Question: Maze kwiyandikisha ariko nsanze nashyizemo kuzakorera Rusizi kandi nashakaga Musanze. Munkuriremo iyo dosiye nongere niyandikishe
Answer: Niba application yawe itaremezwa burundu, ushobora kuyihagarika kuri konti yawe ya Irembo ukongera ugasaba. Niba yamaze kwemezwa, hamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo kugira ngo bakuyobore ku buryo bwo guhindura aho uzakorerara ikizamini.

Question: Ese birashoboka ko mwampindurira uwo twari kuzashakana nkashyiraho undi. Nandikishije ishyingirwa ariko uwo twari kuzashakana yarabyanze nshaka undi
Answer: Impinduka nk'izo zisaba ko ubanza guhagarika ubusabe bwambere ukabona gutanga ubundi bushya. Gana umurenge wandikishirijemo cyangwa ubavugishe unyuze kuri Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe kubikora mu buryo bukurikije amategeko.

Question: Ndashaka kwishyura imisoro hakiri kare bataramfungira.
Answer: Ushobora kwishyura imisoro y'ubutaka ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa ukoresheje mobile money (MoMo Pay) ukurikiza amabwiriza yatanzwe na RRA (Ikigo cy'Imisoro n'Amahoro).

Question: Nabonye ku mbuga zanyu mwatumenyesheje ko mushobora kudufasha gusimbuza amafoto yo ku ndangamuntu, ndasabwa iki?
Answer: Gusimbuza ifoto ku ndangamuntu bisaba ko usaba indangamuntu nshya. Gana ku rubuga rwa Irembo, hitamo serivisi yo gusaba indangamuntu, maze ukurikize amabwiriza, harimo no kohereza ifoto nshya ikurikije ibisabwa.

Question: Mu kwiyandikisha kuri permit, kuki buri gihe nsangamo imyanya yo muri Busanza gusa?
Answer: Imyanya yo gukorera ibizamini bya permit ishyirwaho hashingiwe ku mashuri yigisha gutwara ibinyabiziga n'ahantu hakorerwa ibizamini. Imyanya ishobora kuba ari mike cyangwa yaruzuye ahandi. Gerageza kureba kenshi cyangwa uhamagare Polisi ishami rishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda.

Question: Maze kwishyura Traffic fine ariko nsanga n'umushoferi wanjye nawe yishyuye, ubwo ayo mafaranga turayasubizwa bigenze gute?
Answer: Niba habayeho kwishyura inshuro ebyiri ihazabu y'umuhanda, mutwandikire mufite ibimenyetso by'ubwishyu (receipts) zombi. Tuzagenzura ikibazo cyanyu kandi tubafashe mu nzira yo gusaba gusubizwa amafaranga y'inyongera.

Question: ko ubushize nasabye icyemezo cy'uko ntafunzwe nkahita nkibona, ubu bwo kuki cyatinze? kimaze icyumweru kirenga.
Answer: Igihe gisabwa gishobora guhinduka bitewe n'umubare w'abasaba cyangwa igenzura rikenewe. Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo kugira ngo ubaze.

Question: Twasabye ibyemezo by'uko tutafunzwe njye na madamu n'umuhungu wanjye ariko bo barabibonye njye sinzi impamvu byatinze
Answer: Hari igihe igenzura ku muntu umwe ritwara igihe kirenze icy'abandi bitewe n'amakuru agomba kubanza kugenzurwa. Ushobora gukurikirana ubusabe bwawe kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo ngo umenye aho bigeze.

Question: Nifuzaga kumenya aho icyangombwa cyanjye cy'ubutaka kigeze kuko twakoze mutation ukwezi gushize kandi sindabona icyangombwa cyanjye
Answer: Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo ukoresheje numero ya dosiye wahawe. Niba utayibona, hamagara serivisi z'abakiriya ba Irembo cyangwa uwegere ikigo gishinzwe ubutaka.

Question: Mvuye mu kizamini ariko nahise nzimya machine ntabonye amanota yanjye, mwamfasha kuyamenya
Answer: Amanota y'ibizamini bya permit ubusanzwe yoherezwa kuri telefone wandikishije cyangwa kuri email. Niba utayabonye, injira kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa uhamagare umurongo w'ubufasha kugira ngo barebe uko byagenze.

Question: Kubera iki umuntu akenera icyemezo cy'uko ari ho kandi mumubona ko ari muzima?
Answer: Icyemezo cy'uko uriho kiba gikenewe n'inzego zimwe na zimwe (nka banki, ubwishingizi, n'ibindi) kugira ngo zemeze ko umuntu akiriho, cyane cyane mu bijyanye n'imicungire y'umutungo cyangwa ubwiteganyirize. Ni inyandiko yemewe n'amategeko.

Question: Bitewe n'uko mbona serivisi z'Irembo ari ingenzi cyane kandi hano mu gace kacu nta bantu dufite badufasha kuzibona, ndashaka kuzajya mbikorera bagenzi. Ni gute nabona compte nanjye nkajya nsabira abantu serivisi.
Answer: Kugira ngo ube umu agent wa Irembo ugomba kubanza kubisaba. Gana ku rubuga rwa Irembo ushake amakuru ajyanye no kuba umu agent cyangwa uhamagare serivisi z'abakiriya babo bakuyobore ku bisabwa n'inzira zikurikizwa.

Question: Nk'uko mudushikariza kwisabira serivisi ku Irembo, nabigerageze nsaba passport ariko ndi gushyiraho ifoto ntibikunda bakambwira ko ari nini. Ndabigenza nte?
Answer: Menya neza ko ifoto ushyiraho yujuje ibisabwa byose bijyanye n'ingano (size) na format. Irembo isobanura neza ibipimo by'ifoto yemewe ku rubuga rwayo. Gerageza kugabanya ubunini bwayo ukoresheje software cyangwa application ibikora.

Question: Kubera iki umuntu asaba icyemezo cy'uko ari ingaragu bakamusaba kuzana icyemezo kerekana ko ari ingaragu akuye mu mudugudu?
Answer: Icyemezo cy'ubuseribateri gitangwa n'ubuyobozi bw'ibanze (Umudugudu/Akagari) kugira ngo cyemeze ko koko utarashaka. Irembo ifasha mu gusaba icyo cyemezo ariko kigomba kuba gishingiye ku makuru atangwa n'ubuyobozi bukwegereye.

Question: Ubusanzwe pasiporo itwara igihe kingana gute ko mbona iyanjye yatinze?
Answer: Igihe cyo kubona pasiporo gishobora gutandukana bitewe n'ubwoko bwa pasiporo wasabye n'umubare w'abandi basaba. Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukabaza ku biro by'abinjira n'abasohoka.

Question: Numvise ko ku Irembo mushobora kumfasha kubona diplome ifite agaciro ko mu Rwanda kuko njye nize muri Israel. Bigenda gute?
Answer: Yego, Irembo itanga serivisi yo gusaba icyemezo cy'ihwanya (equivalence) rya diplome zo mu mahanga. Injira kuri konti yawe ya Irembo, ushake iyo serivisi, hanyuma ukurikize amabwiriza yo gusaba, harimo no gutanga inyandiko zisabwa.

Question: Muraho! Ni gute umuntu yabona icyemezo cy'ubushinjacyaha mu gihe agikeneye?
Answer: Icyemezo cy'ubushinjacyaha gitangwa na RIB (Ikigo gishinzwe Ubufatanye n'Ukuri) kugira ngo cyemeze ko umuntu akiriho atakiriye inyandiko z'ubushinjacyaha. Ushobora gusaba icyo cyemezo kuri urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa RIB.

Question: Nagiye gusaba akazi muri RBA bansaba icyemezo cy'amavuko kandi njyewe nsanze acte de naissance, nayo ubwo ntibayemera?
Answer: Acte de naissance ni icyemezo cy'ubwana cyatanzwe n'ababyeyi cyangwa abazungu ba muntu wese. Irembo ifasha mu gusaba icyemezo cy'amavuko, ariko kigomba kuba gishingiye ku makuru atangwa n'ababyeyi cyangwa abazungu. Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo ngo umenye aho bigeze.

Question: Mfite uruhushya rwo gutwara imodoka, ndashaka urundi ruhushya rwo gutwara moto. Ndaca mu zihe nzira?
Answer: Ushobora gusaba uruhushya rwo gutwara moto ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa RTRA (Ikigo gishinzwe Gutwara no Kuhagararira).

Question: Mfite ikibanza kinini naguze hariya Rusororo. Ariko ndashaka kukigabanyamo kabiri hamwe nkazaturamo ahandi nkazubakamo amazu akodeshwa. Bambwiye ko mbisabira ku Irembo, mwamfasha kumenya icyo bisaba?
Answer: Ushobora gusaba icyemezo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubutaka kugira ngo cyemeze ko umutungo wawe utagabanywa. Injira kuri konti yawe ya Irembo, ushake serivisi yo gusaba icyemezo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubutaka, hanyuma ukurikize amabwiriza yo gusaba, harimo no gutanga inyandiko zisabwa.

Question: Ndangije kwiga secondaire, ndashaka guhita nkorera perimi mu gihe ntaratangira kwiga. Mwamfasha mu nzira nanyuramo?
Answer: Ushobora gusaba perimi ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa RTRA (Ikigo gishinzwe Gutwara no Kuhagararira).

Question: Ku kazi badusabye icyemezo cy'uko tutafunzwe. Natanze icyemezo gisanzwe nakuye muri parike umwaka ushize baracyanga. Mwamenyera neza iki cyemezo kimara igihe kingana gute mu by'ukuri ndetse n'uko nabigenza ngo mbone icyemezo gishya?
Answer: Icyemezo cy'uko tutafunzwe gishobora kuba gikenewe n'inzego zimwe na zimwe (nka kazi, ubwishingizi, n'ibindi) kugira ngo zemeze ko umuntu akiriho, cyane cyane mu bijyanye n'imicungire y'umutungo cyangwa ubwiteganyirize. Igihe cyo kwishyura icyemezo gishobora gutandukana bitewe n'inzego zikwegereye. Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo ngo umenye aho bigeze.

Question: Ejo banyibye ibyangombwa byanjye birimo perimi n'indangamuntu. Ubu koko naca mu zihe nzira ngo mbone ibindi byangombwa?
Answer: Ushobora gusanga ibyangombwa byawe byose kuri konti yawe ya Irembo, cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo kugira ngo bakurikirane ikibazo cyawe.
